Description: Available September 1st! This great 3 bedroom unit in highly sought after Cambridge Port location will not last! Convenient to shops, restaurants plus! The unit has great space, a large livingroom with tons of windows and natural light and an eat-in kitchen. Enjoy both front and back porches plus a commuters' paradise just under a mile to both the Green and Red Lines. Laundry in buliding! And 1 off-street parking spot!
